sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-user-management', templateUrl: './user-management.component.html', styleUrls: ['./user-management.component.css'] }) export class UserManagementComponent implements OnInit { totalEmployeePerPage: number[] = [5, 6, 7, 8, 9, 10]; firstName: string[] = ["Trung", "Thành", "Quốc", "Anh", "Thị Tâm", "Thị An", "Quỳnh Anh", "Văn Toàn", "Huy"]; lastName: string[] = ["Trần", "Nguyễn", "Lý", "Phan", "Lê", "Hoàng", "Vũ", "Đinh", "Đặng", "Dương"]; constructor() { } ngOnInit() { } fullname(): any { const fIndex = Math.floor(Math.random() * this.firstName.length); const lIndex = Math.floor(Math.random() * this.lastName.length); return this.firstName[fIndex] + this.lastName[lIndex]; } }
